name: deviceState_getOpenStatus
description: This function is used to get the open status of SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose open status is being checked.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action related to the devices.
